rewrite1: Begin by adjusting the first paragraph's line spacing to double. Then, apply the Level 1 Outline formatting. Finally, set a hanging indent of 1 character.
rewrite2: Begin by adjusting the line spacing of the first paragraph to double. Then, apply an Outline Level 1 format to it. Finally, set a hanging indent of 1 character.
rewrite3: Begin with the first paragraph: adjust the line spacing to double, apply the Level 1 Outline formatting, and establish a hanging indent of one character.
